snippet: ESPN suspended Schilling, one of its “Sunday Night Baseball” analysts, for the rest of the regular season and the postseason wild-card playoff game.
abstract: ESPN baseball analyst Curt Schilling is suspended for remainder of regular season as well as postseason wild-card playoff game, apparently because of angry letter he wrote to writer who covered his previous social media actions.
lead_paragraph: ESPN suspended Schilling, one of its “Sunday Night Baseball” analysts, for the rest of the regular season and the postseason wild-card playoff game.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Sports Media; Schilling’s Ban Extended
